mapper.select: SELECT WAREIZ.WARE_NO AS CODE_ID /* 창고번호 */ , WAREIZ.WARE_NM AS CODE_NAME /* 창고명 */ , WAREIZ.WARE_MNGT_PRTNR_NO /* 창고관리파트너번호 */ FROM TB_SVST_MCBY_WARE_IZ WAREIZ /* 월별창고내역 */ WHERE APY_YM = SUBSTR(#{stOstrDt},1,6) AND WARE_DV_CD = '2' AND WARE_DTL_DV_CD = '20' ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(SORT_DV_VAL) , CODE_NAME , WARE_NO

SELECT WARE_NO AS CODE_ID /* 창고번호 */ , WARE_NM AS CODE_NAME /* 창고명 */ , WARE_DV_CD /* 창고구분코드 */ FROM TB_SVST_MCBY_WARE_IZ /* 월별창고내역 */ WHERE WARE_DV_CD = '3' AND WARE_DTL_DV_CD = '30' AND WARE_USE_YN ='Y' AND APY_YM = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMM') ORDER BY WARE_NM

SELECT OSTR_IZ.ITM_PD_CD AS ITM_PD_CD /* 품목상품코드 */ , PD_BAS.PD_NM AS ITEM_NM /* 품목명 */ , OSTR_IZ.OSTR_WARE_NO AS OSTR_WARE_NO /* 출고창고번호 */ , WARE_IZ.WARE_NM AS WARE_NM /* 창고명 */ , OSTR_IZ.ITM_GD_CD AS ITM_GD_CD /* 품목등급코드 */ , OSTR_IZ.OSTR_DT AS OSTR_DT /* 출고일자 */ , F_CMZ_CD_NM(#{session.tenantId}, 'BIL_RSON_CD', OSTR_IZ.OSTR_RSON_CD) AS OSTR_RSON_CD /* 출고사유코드명 */ , OSTR_IZ.OSTR_QTY AS OSTR_QTY /* 출고수량 */ , WARE_IZ.SORT_DV_VAL AS SORT_DV_VAL /* 정렬구분 */ , OSTR_IZ.RMK_CN AS RMK_CN /* 비고 */ , PD_BAS.SAP_MAT_CD AS SAP_MAT_CD /* SAP자재코드 */ FROM TB_SVST_ITM_OSTR_IZ OSTR_IZ /* 품목출고내역 */ INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_BAS PD_BAS /* 상품기본 */ ON PD_BAS.PD_CD = OSTR_IZ.ITM_PD_CD INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_ECOM_PRP_DTL PRP_DTL /* 상품각사속성상세 */ ON PD_BAS.PD_CD = PRP_DTL.PD_CD AND PRP_DTL.PD_EXTS_PRP_GRP_CD = 'PART' INNER JOIN TB_SVST_MCBY_WARE_IZ WARE_IZ ON WARE_IZ.WARE_NO = OSTR_IZ.OSTR_WARE_NO AND WARE_IZ.APY_YM = SUBSTR(OSTR_IZ.OSTR_DT,1,6) WHERE OSTR_IZ.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND PD_BAS.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND WARE_IZ.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND PRP_DTL.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND OSTR_IZ.OSTR_TP_CD = '217' AND OSTR_IZ.OSTR_DT BETWEEN #{stOstrDt} AND #{edOstrDt} AND WARE_IZ.WARE_DV_CD = '3' AND WARE_IZ.WARE_DTL_DV_CD = '30'
AND OSTR_IZ.OSTR_WARE_NO = #{ostrWareNo}
